ing: 2 tablespoons freshly grated mozzarella cheese, or to taste
2 tablespoons Italian-style salad dressing, or to taste
2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste
des: "This salad is delicious and easy to eat. It's even better when accompanied by a side of tasty garlic bread."
ins: Toss romaine lettuce and radicchio together in a bowl. Add Roma tomato, salami, pepperoni, garbanzo beans, olives, and mozzarella cheese; mix well. Pour Italian-style salad dressing over salad; mix well. Garnish salad with Parmesan cheese.
